pr_title: throw ExistedException if create schemas with same name and properties different

timeline.author: javeme
javeme
javeme

timeline.bodyText: prefer to move this method to class EdgeLabel, and process parent fields by each super class like SchemaLabel/SchemaElement
timeline.author: javeme

replies.author: houzhizhen

timeline.author: javeme
javeme
javeme

timeline.message: Check for 4 types of schema: propertyKey,vertexLabel,indexLabel,and edgeLabel. If the two or more create statements as the code follows are identical, the system will only create one schema quietly.

timeline.bodyText: here this. enableLabelIndex = false, seems only existedEdgeLabel.enableLabelIndex() == true should return false.
timeline.author: Linary

replies.bodyText: Good job, this is a bug.
replies.author: houzhizhen

timeline.bodyText: There should no space between ! and existedEdgeLabel.sourceLabel().equals(sourceId) in our code style
timeline.author: Linary

timeline.message: bug fix: current enableLabelIndex is false, and existed enableLabelIndex is true, it should return false

timeline.author: zhoney

timeline.bodyText:
more or less empty
Only baseType, baseValue, indexType, indexFields are checked.
timeline.author: zhoney

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/hugegraph-core/src/main/java/com/baidu/hugegraph/schema/builder/IndexLabelBuilder.java b/hugegraph-core/src/main/java/com/baidu/hugegraph/schema/builder/IndexLabelBuilder.java
index fb5a31a8..a94397dd 100644
--- a/hugegraph-core/src/main/java/com/baidu/hugegraph/schema/builder/IndexLabelBuilder.java
+++ b/hugegraph-core/src/main/java/com/baidu/hugegraph/schema/builder/IndexLabelBuilder.java

@@ -102,8 +102,8 @@ public class IndexLabelBuilder extends AbstractBuilder
 
     /**
      * Check whether this has same properties with existedIndexLabel.
-     * Only baseType,baseValue,indexType, indexFields are checked.
-     * The id, checkExist, transaction,userdata are not checked.
+     * Only baseType, baseValue, indexType, indexFields are checked.
+     * The id, checkExist, userdata are not checked.
      * @param existedIndexLabel to be compared with
      * @return true if this has same properties with existedIndexLabel
      */

timeline.author: zhoney

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/hugegraph-core/src/main/java/com/baidu/hugegraph/schema/builder/PropertyKeyBuilder.java b/hugegraph-core/src/main/java/com/baidu/hugegraph/schema/builder/PropertyKeyBuilder.java
index e2a9ddb6..d9b58e20 100644
--- a/hugegraph-core/src/main/java/com/baidu/hugegraph/schema/builder/PropertyKeyBuilder.java
+++ b/hugegraph-core/src/main/java/com/baidu/hugegraph/schema/builder/PropertyKeyBuilder.java

@@ -101,8 +101,8 @@ public class PropertyKeyBuilder extends AbstractBuilder
 
     /**
      * Check whether this has same properties with propertyKey.
-     * Only dataType, cardinality, aggregateType  are checked.
-     * The id, checkExist, transaction,userdata are not checked.
+     * Only dataType, cardinality, aggregateType are checked.
+     * The id, checkExist, userdata are not checked.
      * @param propertyKey to be compared with
      * @return true if this has same properties with propertyKey
      */

timeline.author: zhoney

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/hugegraph-core/src/main/java/com/baidu/hugegraph/schema/builder/VertexLabelBuilder.java b/hugegraph-core/src/main/java/com/baidu/hugegraph/schema/builder/VertexLabelBuilder.java
index 9df59a5f..f427f665 100644
--- a/hugegraph-core/src/main/java/com/baidu/hugegraph/schema/builder/VertexLabelBuilder.java
+++ b/hugegraph-core/src/main/java/com/baidu/hugegraph/schema/builder/VertexLabelBuilder.java

@@ -139,8 +139,8 @@ public class VertexLabelBuilder extends AbstractBuilder
 
     /**
      * Check whether this has same properties with existedVertexLabel.
-     * Only  properties,  primaryKeys, nullableKeys, enableLabelIndex  are checked.
-     * The id, idStrategy, checkExist, transaction,userdata are not checked.
+     * Only properties, primaryKeys, nullableKeys, enableLabelIndex are checked.
+     * The id, idStrategy, checkExist, userdata are not checked.
      * @param existedVertexLabel to be compared with
      * @return true if this has same properties with existedVertexLabel
      */

timeline.message: fix space problem in methods comments
